Class Str

java.lang.Object
kut.Str
public class Str extends Object

  • Method Details

    • cmp

      public static int cmp(String s1, String s2)
      Compares two strings using the Sys.collator.
      Parameters:
      s1 - First String.
      s2 - Second String.
      Returns:
      -1 if s1 < s1, 0 if s1 == s2 and 1 if s1 > s2.

      Parameters:

      args - 'fm' arguments.
      Returns:
      'fm' sustitutiyng variables by arguments.

      Parameters:
      s - String to cut.
      n - Number of characters.
      Returns:
      'sub(s, 0, n)'.

    • quote

      public static String quote(String s)
      Quotes 's', replacing '"' by '\"' and '\' by '\\'. (e.g. a"bc -> "a\"bc")
      Parameters:
      s - String to quote.
      Returns:
      's' quoted.

    • right

      public static String right(String s, int n)
      Equals to sub(s, n, s.length()).
      Parameters:
      s - String to cut.
      n - Number of characters.
      Returns:
      'sub(s, 0, n)'.

      public static String rtrim(String s)

      Returns:

    • split

      public static ArrayList<String> split(String s, String sep)
      Splits a String with the 'sep'.

      Examples:

      sys.test(arr.size(str.split("", "")), 0);
      sys.test(arr.join(str.split("", ""), ""), "");
      sys.test(arr.size(str.split("a", "")), 1);
      sys.test(arr.join(str.split("a", ""), ""), "a");
      sys.test(arr.size(str.split("añ", "")), 2);
      sys.test(arr.join(str.split("añ", ""), ""), "añ");
      sys.test(arr.size(str.split("", ";")), 1;
      sys.test(arr.join(str.split("", ";"), ";"), "");
      sys.test(arr.size(str.split("ab;cd;", ";")), 3);
      sys.test(arr.join(str.split("ab;cd;", ";"), ";"), "ab;cd;");
      sys.test(arr.size(str.split("ab;cd", ";")), 2);
      sys.test(arr.join(str.split("ab;cd", ";"), ";"), "ab;cd")

      Parameters:
      s - String to split.
      sep - Separator to use.
      Returns:
      Array.

    • splitTrim

      public static ArrayList<String> splitTrim(String s, String sep)
      Equals to 'split' but 'trimming' strings.
      Parameters:
      s - String to split.
      sep - Separator to use.
      Returns:
      Array.

    • sub

      public static String sub(String s, int begin, int end)
      Returns characters of 's' between 'begin' inclusive and 'end' exclusive.
      Parameters:
      s - String to cut.
      begin - If it is less than 0, it is set to s.length() + begin. If it is less than 0 yet, it is set to 0. If it is greater than s.length(), it is set to s.length().
      end - If it is less than 0, it is set to s.length() + begin. If then it is less than begin, it is set to begin. If it is greater than s.length(), it is set to s.length().
      Returns:
      String.

    • toIso

      public static byte[] toIso(String s)
      Returns 'byte[]' codified in ISO-8859-15 from String.
      Parameters:
      s - String
      Returns:
      Bytes.
